medical_history.chief_complaint: Chronic fatigue and 10-lb weight loss over the past 2 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr H's fatigue has been chronic and has progressed with a weight loss of 10 lbs over the past 2 years. Initial evaluation revealed no anemia, and medication associations with his symptoms were ruled out. His fatigue persists despite investigations.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV diagnosed in 1984, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, osteoporosis, depression, atherosclerotic subclavian steal syndrome (stent placement), chronic kidney insufficiency, adenomatous colon polyps, past anal squamous cell carcinoma.
medical_history.social_history: Lives with a partner but expresses concerns about social isolation due to the deaths of many HIV-positive acquaintances. Participates in a support group for older adults with HIV, is a former smoker who drinks a glass of wine with dinner, never drank heavily or used recreational drugs, and is currently not sexually active.
